description: Defines a widget for a single cell in a Tic Tac Toe game grid, including visual styling and tap interaction.

classes.name: BoardTile
classes.description: A StatelessWidget representing a single tile in the Tic Tac Toe grid, displaying a value ('X' or 'O') and handling tap events.

methods.name: _valueColor
methods.description: Determines the color of the cell's text based on its value ('X' or 'O'), using custom app theme colors.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the visual representation of the BoardTile widget, including styling, gesture detection, and text display.
